edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.acoustic.tiedstate.tiedmixture

Class MixtureComponentSetScores

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.acoustic.tiedstate.tiedmixture.MixtureComponentSetScores

  • public class MixtureComponentSetScores
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to keep scores of mixture components for certain frame. Is use useful in case of fast match to avoid scoring gaussians twice
